name: spo-update-largelist-pnpbatch-with-retry
title: Update large list with PnP-Batch with retries to address throttling challenges
shortDescription: This sample shows how to efficiently update a large SharePoint list of 60,000 or more items using PnP-Batch, significantly reducing update time.
longDescription: This sample shows how to efficiently update a large SharePoint list of 60,000 or more items using PnP-Batch, significantly reducing update time. It addresses throttling challenges, emphasizing exception handling and retry mechanisms to ensure smooth updates.

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
